frontmatter.title: Match Analysis: Tottenham vs Newcastle - Premier League 2024
frontmatter.description: A detailed analysis of the Premier League match between Tottenham and Newcastle, highlighting key events and player performances.

sections.heading: Match Overview
paragraphs: In a closely contested match, Newcastle managed to secure a victory over Tottenham with a score of 2-1. The match featured early goals from both teams, setting the tone for an intense encounter.

figures.alt: Pass network and formation for Tottenham showing player positions and passing connections.
figures.caption: Tottenham pass network with average player positions and key passing links.

claims.claim: Newcastle capitalized on their chances effectively.
Tottenham had a higher possession percentage.

player_notes.summary: Scored the only goal for Tottenham but could not influence the game further.
Scored the winning goal and was pivotal in Newcastle's attack.

data_limitations: Insufficient detailed statistics on player performance metrics such as passes completed and shots taken.
cta: Explore more match analyses and player statistics.
